item.description:
Join us for this popular singles dance run by Together .

I am posting this event for multiple meetup groups.

We usually get an excellent turnout.

There is a dress code. No jeans or sneakers.

It costs $10 before 9 PM and $12 after that.

I may not be able to arrive until 9 but Ken and Cindy (from another meetup group) should be arriving early enough to get a table for those arriving before me. They should have a meetup sign on the table.


Assistant organizer Neil
item.how_to_find_us: I'll wear a name tag. I think that there will be a "Meetup" sign at our table. I could also put my "NEIL" baseball cap on the table.
item.why: There will be lots of single people there and lots of dancing.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Singles Dance
